title: Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA)
description: The update process of checkboxes in the Export Zip feature is taking a long time (approximately 30 seconds in my case). During this time, a busy cursor should be displayed to indicate that the process is ongoing.
OB: Currently, no busy cursor is shown while the checkboxes are being updated, even though the process takes a long time.
EB: A busy cursor should be displayed while the checkboxes are being updated in the Export Zip feature.
SR:
1. Open the Export Zip feature. 
2. Select a large number of checkboxes to update. 
3. Observe that a busy cursor is not displayed. 
4. Wait for the checkboxes to update and note the time it takes. 
5. Expected behavior: A busy cursor should be shown during the update process.
